page.title: 01Market Lavington.
page.content: Market Lavington,a small village in an enclosed area is peaceful despite the noise of tanks and guns.Our village is in a valley with the army estate in the gigantic ditch.The shops are west of the estate,the school is north, south is{Salisbury Plain}and east is Easterton.A main road goes through West Lavington,Market Lavington and Easterton with roads leading to the army estate,the school and{Broadwell} where people used to get their water. It isn't like a well,more like a concrete swimming pool.Our school is on top of a hill up which I walk. Between Market Lavington and West Lavington there is a comprehensive school where children from Market Lavington,Easterton,West Lavington and Urchfont go.
